venue.address_1: ACROSS STREET from 261 Union St. (Crepes Tea House), Ground Floor; Park & enter on the opposite side of the st. from Tea House
venue.name: A to Z Moving Company

item.description:
LOCATION CHANGED! - We will be having this Meetup at our normal location in West Springfield - if you would like the chance to check out the group in a social way and see where we meet and who we are ... this is the chance! Bring some food to share. 

August's FIFTH WEDNESDAY Community Event will be an outdoor get together at one of the Trustees of Reservations properties managed by our very own Josh Knox.

We had such a great time in June with a PICNIC / BBQ - that we decided to do it again! Bring your partner, your kids, your friends. Hang out, have great food, talk, throw a frisbee around, take a walk in the beautiful farm. No expectations, a super easy way to meet the guys and gals connected to OPEN MEN. Hope we will see you there!!

BRING A DISH TO SHARE. BRING SOMETHING TO THROW ON THE GRILL. 

Bring real silverware and a plate or two ... help us reduce our carbon footprint. 

It's on the borderline between Holyoke and Springfield, MA. You and your family are welcome to attend! This will be an open, bring a dish to pass and have some grilled stuff MeetUp. We will probably take a small amount of time to check in with one another and introduce ourselves, but this is a wide open evening for relaxation and connection in community, right down by the Connecticut River.

LOCATION CHANGED! - We will be having this Meetup at our normal location in West Springfield - if you would like the chance to check out the group in a social way and see where we meet and who we are ... this is the chance! Bring some food to share. 

We will meet at the Jones Ferry Boathouse  (plenty of parking) directly off Rte 5 by the Sisters of Providence Hospital in Holyoke, MA. Walk in to the conservation property through the Nuestras Raices farm property (there's a gate and a sign on Jones Ferry Road).

Follow the Link for a map. [ http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=...]
item.how_to_find_us: THIS WILL BE AT OUR NORMAL PLACE - UNION STREET WEST SPRINGFIELD.

group.name: Open Men's Group - Personal Mastery Workgroup

item.name: Build Community with Friends & Family!
